info.name: Wider Todoist
info.description: Increases the width of the browser-based app. Customization options: Total width Changes the width of the entire app. Affects the content area only Choose between 60%, 70% or 80% of the browser window width. The default is 80%. Left Column Changes the width of the left column Choose between "Default" & "Wider"
